# sqlite

SQLite CLI tools (sqlite3)

**Category:** Database

## Restrictive

Read-only operations safe for exploration and code review.

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `sqlite3 --version` | Check SQLite version |
| `sqlite3 -version` | Check SQLite version |

## Standard

Day-to-day development commands. Includes all restrictive commands plus:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `sqlite3` | SQLite CLI |
